author: Taylor Telford, Thomas Heath
title: Stock markets surge even as the U.S. braces for ‘hardest and saddest’ week - The Washington Post
description: Stock markets surge even as the U.S. braces for ‘hardest and saddest’ week The Washington Post
content:
Americans hit by economic shocks as confusion, stumbles undermine Trumps stimulus effort
The Dow jumped more than 900 points, or 4 percent, at the open. The Standard & Poors 500 and Nasdaq also posted big gains.
Stocks in the UK, Europe and Asia rallied… [+3215 chars]
